channel.title: Illinois MBA Admissions
channel.description: Events hosted by the Illinois MBA program both domestically and internationally.

item.title: Professional MBA information session
item.description: This session is specifically for working professionals who would like to learn about the Professional MBA curriculum, class schedule, and tuition costs.  Come hear about exciting scholarship opportunities and admission requirements.

item.title: Late Applicant MBA Application Deadline (For Domestic Applicants)
